ModMetaData.name: Another Milk Retexture - Re-Bagged!
ModMetaData.author: XxHyde840xX, MallowYellow, flo.vall, Shakesthespeare, TrahsPanda
ModMetaData.description:
Changes the texture of milks from Alpha Animals, Alpha Bees, and Vanilla Genetics Expanded to swanky, stackable bottles. Vanilla milk, VFME Simple Tofu's soy milk, and VFE: Insectoids mils are retextured with bags, because I am Canadian. We have bagged milk here.
Original mods can be found here: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3024040282 / https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2317332459.
